stages.logText: Arensia is being taunted by forest Fae while she slumbers. I agreed to help get rid of the mischevious creatures. I should talk to Rigmor, she lives in North Fallhaven.
Fae live near fairy rings. I should look for circular mushroom formations in the forest around Fallhaven.
I have to give the Fae a gift of two red apples and two strawberries, before I can talk to them.
The Fae accepted my gift. I am allowed to talk with them.
The Fae are considering my request to help.
The Fae agreed to leave Arensia be, on condition that I chop down a tree inside their fairy ring.
They changed their mind about chopping down the tree.
The Fae now want four bottles of mead.
They took the mead, but now want something else.
I have to find ten wild flowers for the Fae.
They accepted the flowers, but said they still want something.
The Fae want a token of Arensia's promise: that she will not to pick their mushrooms again.
I have Arensia's promise ring. I should give it to the Fae at once.
I gave Arensia's ring of promise to the Fae.
The Fae agreed to stop taunting Arensia. I should tell her!
Arensia was elated that the Fae will no longer taunt her.
I could not take the Fae's absurd requests any further. I am no longer helping Arensia with her problem.
I lied about Arensia's ring and kept it for myself.
Arensia gave me her magical promise ring.
